website_summaries.verdict: A vegetarian wet dog food that contains avocados and avocado oil rich in omega-3 and omega-6.
pros: Free of meat, eggs, dairy, corn, soy, and wheat
Great for dogs with most common allergies
Notable for being completely free from artificial flavors, colors, and preservatives
Made in the USA from premium ingredients
cons: Avocados can be toxic to dogs in large quantities, which makes us question whether an avocado-based dog food is a wise idea

customer_reviews.title: Apparently, delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs ate this up like they were starving. My room mates smelled it and said, "This actually smells pretty good!" Highly recommend, and yes, dogs can be vegetarian. Mine have been for about 10 years now.
customer_reviews.author: tara mansion

customer_reviews.title: ... my dogs a combination of this brand (their least favorite of the three)
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs a combination of this brand (their least favorite of the three), Natural Balance vegetarian, and Evanger's vegetarian canned foods. It keeps the flavors interesting and has supported their good health for a combined 8 years now.
customer_reviews.author: waimanu

customer_reviews.title: So far it's working wonders
customer_reviews.text: I think this switch is working wonders for my 12 yo golden mix. Her hair was all patchy and has grown back just like when she was younger as I believe she developed an allergy to the type D chicken and who knows what other kind of animals tossed in most all dog foods in the stores. Hopefully this will buy my girl a good number of more years and that is priceless to me 💕 I devide the cans into 3 parts, add hot water and serve as a topper on some other salmon based dog food also sold on amazon..I'm very happy with so far
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Pardieck

customer_reviews.title: My dig LOVES this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes crazy for this food. I mix it with kibble to get her to gain some weight. My cat has even tried to steal it. I’m very happy with this food. Her poops are a bit soft-serve, and she’s goes more frequently, but that’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Lovegood

customer_reviews.title: Google avacado for dog before try
customer_reviews.text: This caused severe digestive issues for my morkie puppy. We tried small quantity twice in our attempt to switch to high-quality vegetarian food. But the puppy had diarrhea and it was painful to see him go through. This product claims to have good nutrition but note that avacado can be bad for most dogs. Consider this choice with a caution.
customer_reviews.author: an ko

customer_reviews.title: my dog has IBD.. and the only issue ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog has IBD.. and the only issue with this is that he gets the runs with this. not sure why as moisture content is low.. however, with his IBD.. he is allergic to fat and this has too high of fat for him. ideally it should be between 1-2% I have a ton of cans left over.. more than I know what to do with..
customer_reviews.author: Df186

customer_reviews.title: Warning... diarrhea poop and throw up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has given my dogs the softest poop ever. It’s disgusting. One of my dogs threw up from it. Check the ingredients vs other vegan options, like Halo, and you’ll see what junk this stuff is! Disappointed by the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs do like this food so that is OK with me. The only problem I see is that it is quite dry compared to most other wet dog food that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: MarleneLouiseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love this. I wish it had pop open lids like Halo. Need to open these with a can opener.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about my dogs liking this but they absolutely love it! They get so excited when they know it's meal time and run straight to their bowls!
customer_reviews.author: MVT

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: She likes it! I switched from another vegan brand that increased in price.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived amazingly fast
customer_reviews.text: My little pooch has been eating this for quite some time and has yet to get bored of it. It was very challenging to find vegetarian dog food so I was very grateful to find this brand with good ingredients. Also, holy cow I ordered this on a Saturday evening and it arrived Monday morning! How?? Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rhoudini

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs really like this dog food. They mostly eat kibble and this canned food is used as a bit of a treat for them. They love it....
customer_reviews.author: David Billing

customer_reviews.title: Upset Stomach in Both Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs (2, small mixed breed) enjoy the taste but it gave them loose stool. Returned to their previous food and back again to make sure it was the food and not something else. Will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Get less for more
customer_reviews.text: Price went up $5, and I've noticed they started thinking they were clever by leaving a hole in the food at the middle bottom of the can so that it contains less.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: AvoDerm vegetarian dog food
customer_reviews.text: every can of this food has a large empty hole at the bottom of the can which makes me feel I am not getting what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: W. Modam

customer_reviews.title: Not real happy with the product quality on my most recent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not real happy with the product quality on my most recent purchase. What looked like to me, were were small white specs that could be mold. I noticed this immediately after opening. Needless to say, I wil be switching to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it and it's veggie - can't complain :)
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I top his vdog kibble with it and he’s a happy pup.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff. I top his vdog kibble with it and he’s a happy pup.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sunderland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by their breeder and both dogs just love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels  Long

customer_reviews.title: Case was opened and cans replaced!
customer_reviews.text: The case was ripped open on the side and all the cans replaced with dented cans. That's not honest!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the risk. 3 out of 4 of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the risk. 3 out of 4 of my dogs started getting gassy within a week of getting this food. 2 weeks later they all 4 had diarrhea. I had to purchase prescription ID from my DVM to get them all back to normal. I did NOT switch their food out in 1 day. It took a week before they even had 1/2 can of the food mixed in with their normal dry food. I had switched it out with Wellness brand which I will go back to.
customer_reviews.author: P. H. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love getting my Avoderm wet dog food via Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Karger

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality control--Half empty cans
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this dog food 73 times. But no more. The last couple cases had half empty cans, and cans packed with huge air bubbles. You can feel the cans are lighter. Last straw was when I opened a completely empty can. If this gets past their quality control, how can I trust feeding this to my dogs?
customer_reviews.author: Gigous

customer_reviews.title: Bad cans of food
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food and we've ordered it a couple of times. Unfortunately, the last 2 times we ordered it there was a can each order that had to be thrown away because it was bad. The bad can had food that was dried out, shrunken, and looks very different from the good can. That is a lot of money to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Holloway

customer_reviews.title: My doggie loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy variety of ingredients and good for her coat and skin, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny H

product_meta.title: AvoDerm Natural Wet Dog Food for All Life Stages, 13 oz Cans (Pack of 12), Vegetarian Recipe
product_meta.description: Style:Vegetarian| Size:13 oz can (pack of 12)AvoDerm® Vegetarian Formula provides quality non-animal protein sources that are ideal for adult dogs with sensitivities to meat protein sources. We use only quality ingredients in all our formulas to provide healthy, balanced levels of protein, fat, and nutrients for adult dogs. Our foods are naturally preserved with mixed tocopherols to ensure freshness and palatability. AvoDerm® was created when a chance encounter with a local farmer produced the idea of combining healthy dog food with the avocado super fruit. The result is history as thousands of pet parents have marveled at the difference AvoDerm® has made with their pets. Feed AvoDerm® regularly to sustain the highest level of nutrition for your dog from the inside out
feature_bullets: Vegetarian Canned Wet Dog Food: Meat Free Ingredients. No Animal Proteins And Fats.
Healthy Skin & Coat: Made With Omega Rich California Avocados And Avocado Oil
All Natural: Contains Only Premium All Natural Ingredients, No By-Products Meals, No Artificial Flavors, Colors Or Preservatives. Corn Free, Wheat Free, Soy Free.

Complete Health: Premium Proteins Are The First Ingredients In All Our Recipes. All Formulas Provide Healthy Balanced Nutrition. High Quality Ingredients Ensure You Are Providing The Optimum Nutrition Your Pet Needs.
Healthy Immune System: Avoderm Natural Pet Foods Have Vitamins, Minerals, And Antioxidant Nutrients To Help Protect Your Pet'S Immune Function.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
